alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Hamilton; Merrick; Valley (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 12 at 3:03PM CDT until May 12 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR GREELEY...WESTERN NANCE...VALLEY...NORTHEASTERN HAMILTON... MERRICK...SHERMAN AND HOWARD COUNTIES... At 302 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ericson to near Greeley to near Wolbach to near Palmer to near St. Libory to near Grand Island to near Hastings, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Palmer and Archer around 310 PM CDT. Spalding and Belgrade around 315 PM CDT. Central City and Fullerton around 320 PM CDT. Hordville around 325 PM CDT. Clarks around 330 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
